name: @blockswan/contract-helpers
description: Helper functions for interacting with blockswan periphery & protocol contracts

scripts.typechain: cp -r ../../contracts/abi/ tmp && rm ./tmp/abi.json && mv ./tmp/contracts.json ./src/json/contracts.json && typechain --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir=./src/typechain/ './tmp/**/*.json' && rm -rf ./tmp
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run typechain && npm run build

author: blockswan
